name: Letter Delivery
description:
A game about starting over and delivering letters! You're moving to a small town in the country where your uncle owns a Post Office and he's promised you a job. Deliver people's mail and talk to them about their lives, and you might find something to love about everyone.

Controls:
Move - Arrow Keys or D-Pad
Interact/Confirm/A - Space or A
Cancel/B - 'X' or B
Pause - Enter or Start
